issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Attempting to migrate an m1.small Linux instance between nodes is crashing/restarting the NC. So far it's been reproducible on every attempt, and restarts the NC within seconds of it receiving the request. 

This results in the migration attempt timing out after >900 seconds on the source node as well. 
{code}

[root@d-01 eucalyptus]# euca-migrate-instances -i i-A28746CD
[root@d-01 eucalyptus]# 
[root@d-01 eucalyptus]# euca-describe-instances
RESERVATION	r-11773CD5	648014244212	test
INSTANCE	i-A28746CD	emi-9D8538C9	10.111.103.12	1.106.31.233	running	test	0		m1.small	2013-09-25T04:21:40.316Z	PARTI00	eki-79473C42	eri-D51F3A62		monitoring-disabled	10.111.103.12	1.106.31.233			instance-store				paravirtualized						
TAG	instance	i-A28746CD	euca:node	10.111.5.3
TAG	instance	i-A28746CD	euca:node:migration:destination	10.111.5.4
TAG	instance	i-A28746CD	euca:node:migration:source	10.111.5.3
TAG	instance	i-A28746CD	euca:node:migration:state	preparing

2013-09-24 22:21:09 DEBUG 000030030 doDescribeInstances      | invoked userId=eucalyptus correlationId=UNSET epoch=33 services[0]{.name=CC_71 .type=cluster .uris[0]=http://10.111.1.71:8774/axis2/services/EucalyptusCC}
2013-09-24 22:21:10 DEBUG 000030030 doMigrateInstances       | verifying 1 instance[s] for migration...
2013-09-24 22:21:10 DEBUG 000030030 doMigrateInstances       | verifying instance # 0...
2013-09-24 22:21:10 DEBUG 000030030 doMigrateInstances       | invoked (action=prepare instance[0].{id=i-A28746CD src=10.111.5.3 dst=10.111.5.4) creds=present
2013-09-24 22:21:10 DEBUG 000030030 doMigrateInstances       | verifying 1 instance[s] for migration...
2013-09-24 22:21:10 DEBUG 000030030 doMigrateInstances       | verifying instance # 0...
2013-09-24 22:21:10 DEBUG 000030030 doMigrateInstances       | [i-A28746CD] proposed migration action 'prepare' (10.111.5.3 > 10.111.5.4) [creds=present]
2013-09-24 22:21:10 DEBUG 000030030 doMigrateInstances       | [i-A28746CD] processing instance # 0 (10.111.5.3 > 10.111.5.4)
2013-09-24 22:21:15  INFO | spawning Eucalyptus node controller v3.4.0 [built 2013-09-24 09:12:52+00:00]
2013-09-24 22:21:15  INFO | NC is looking for configuration in //etc/eucalyptus/eucalyptus.conf,//etc/eucalyptus/eucalyptus.local.conf
2013-09-24 22:21:15  INFO | read (ENABLE_WS_SECURITY=UNSET, default=Y)
2013-09-24 22:21:15  INFO | read (EUCALYPTUS=/, default=/)
2013-09-24 22:21:15  INFO | read (NC_PORT=8775, default=8775)
2013-09-24 22:21:15  INFO | read (NC_SERVICE=axis2/services/EucalyptusNC, default=axis2/services/EucalyptusNC)
2013-09-24 22:21:15  INFO | read (LOGLEVEL=DEBUG, default=DEBUG)
2013-09-24 22:21:15  INFO | read (LOGROLLNUMBER=UNSET, default=10)
2013-09-24 22:21:15  INFO | read (LOGMAXSIZE=UNSET, default=104857600)
2013-09-24 22:21:15  INFO | read (LOGPREFIX=UNSET, default=)

{code}

On source NC the operation will eventually timeout...
{code}
2013-09-24 21:39:15  WARN 000005844 monitoring_thread        | [i-A28746CD] has been in migration state 'ready' on source for 905 seconds (threshold is 900), rolling back [1380083050].
{code}


GDB on destination NC during migration/restart
{code}
Program received signal SIGABRT, Aborted.
0x00007faf0f46b8e5 in raise (sig=6) at ../nptl/sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c:64
64	  return INLINE_SYSCALL (tgkill, 3, pid, selftid, sig);
(gdb) thread apply all backtrace

Thread 3 (Thread 0x7faef9f28700 (LWP 30131)):
#0  0x00007faf0f4e5bcd in nanosleep () at ../sysdeps/unix/syscall-template.S:82

#2  0x00007faf0903ea15 in ?? () from /usr/lib64/axis2c/services/EucalyptusNC/libEucalyptusNC.so

#2  0x00007faf0f464a0e in __assert_fail_base (fmt=<value optimized out>, assertion=0x7faf0905bd86 "instance->params.root", file=0x7faf0905bd18 "xml.c", 
    line=<value optimized out>, function=<value optimized out>) at assert.c:96

fields.summary: NC crash during KVM instance migration

comments.body: Verified in recent package by migrating between nodes.
